coverage_details.organ_transplant: Live & artificial organ transplant (heart, kidney, liver, bone marrow, joint replacement) covered up to annual limit.
coverage_details.approval_preauthorization_notes: No pre-approval required for VIP members for outpatient & in-patient services except outpatient services that have limits. Pre-approval needed only for specific services such as dental (except emergency), kidney dialysis, maternity, and optical, as well as hearing aids.
coverage_details.special_instructions: Medication limit is equal to pre-authorization approval limit. Frames, spectacle lenses, and contact lenses are up to optical limit. Optical covered for all ages and benefit is beyond CHI limitation. Covers all seasonal vaccinations. Artificial limbs, prosthesis, and medical equipment covered. Covers live & artificial organ transplant (heart, kidney, liver, bone marrow, joint replacement) up to annual limit. Covers epidural and knee injections, medical devices for diabetes and pressure disease, FreeStyle Libre and supplies, allergy tests and medication, vitamins, herbal medications if SFDA-registered, all prescribed medical tests/labs, preexisting conditions, diabetic supplies, walking aids, canes, neck cushion, wheelchair, joint stabilizers, syringes/inhalers, congenital illness, cochlea and battery, zero deductible for obesity surgery, ear piercing for girls up to SAR 300.
